definition: engaged in a profession or engaging in as a profession or means of livelihood, an authority qualified to teach apprentices
details:
adjective
- engaged in a profession or engaging in as a profession or means of livelihood
= example: engaged in a profession or engaging in as a profession or means of livelihood
- characteristic of or befitting a profession or one engaged in a profession
= example: characteristic of or befitting a profession or one engaged in a profession
- engaged in by members of a profession
= example: engaged in by members of a profession
- of or relating to a profession
= example: of or relating to a profession
- of or relating to or suitable as a profession
= example: of or relating to or suitable as a profession
noun
- an authority qualified to teach apprentices
= synonyms: master
- a person engaged in one of the learned professions
= synonyms: professional person
- an athlete who plays for pay
= synonyms: pro
